message: Let's agree on this generous split for me, given the inflation I'll be facing. It's a fair deal for both of us!

Alice, if you reject this offer, you'll get to propose in round 3—but by then your share will be worth 20% less, effectively 64% of the original dollar value. With this proposal, you secure an effective 0.8×800000 = $640000 value, which matches your best alternative outcome. Let’s conclude this now and avoid further depreciation on your share.
